name: market for polyvinylfluoride, dispersion | polyvinylfluoride, dispersion | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5417/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'polyvinylfluoride, dispersion', in the Global geography.;This product is generally considered to be used at the production site.  Therefore, the market does not contain any transport.;'polyvinylfluoride, dispersion', is a plastic product of fossil origin, it is not biodegradable and it is a thermoplastic material. This product consists of 100% virgin material with no content of recycled material. The product is used in the following applications and sectors: suitable for outdoor coatings or laminates, used as  flammability-lowering coatings of airplane interiors and photovoltaic module backsheets, in raincoats and metal sheeting.   

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'polyvinylfluoride, dispersion',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  polyvinylfluoride, dispersion', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
